short_summary: Conferencing & Operator Assisted Services (COAS) — Draft Document
full_summary:
Government of Canada
Tender Notice {{ TENDER_NUMBER }}
Conferencing & Operator Assisted Services (COAS)

**Note:** The tender notice has expired on 11 January 2023 14:00:00.

Overview
--------

The government of Canada is soliciting bids for the provision of Conferencing & Operator Assisted Services (COAS) to aid government officials in their duties.

Bid Requirements
----------------

The bid requires vendors to demonstrate their ability to provide a range of conferencing services, including:

* Voice services
* Teleconferencing services

The bidder must have a minimum of 5 years of experience in the provision of similar services.

Requirements for Financial Evaluation
--------------------------------------------

The bidder must submit financial information for evaluation. The evaluation will be based on pricing and pricing is summarized in the attached Annex E Pricing Table.

Additional Requirements
-----------------------

The bidder must participated in a Virtual One-on-One Engagement session to discuss their concerns with the procurement. This session will be held remotely on request.

Decision Making Criteria
----------------------

The bid will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Pricing
* Vendor capabilities

Any questions or concerns may be addressed to Eric Vanasse, Contracting Authority, at eric.vanasse@ssc-spc.gc.ca or 514-607-8519.

Tender Details
----------------

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01016677
* **Publication Date**: 9 December 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: 11 January 2023 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 19 December 2022
* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **Trade Agreements**: Various free trade agreements are applicable.

Attachments
----------

The attached documentation includes the tender document and pricing table.

**Attachments:**

* {{ ATTACHMENT_LINK_3 }})
